verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's abandonment of the Iran nuclear deal [V: may] dramatically ratchet up military tensions in the Middle East , political analysts warned on Wednesday .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's abandonment of the Iran nuclear deal] [ARGM-MOD: may] [ARGM-MNR: dramatically] [V: ratchet] up [ARG1: military tensions in the Middle East] , political analysts warned on Wednesday .
President Donald Trump 's abandonment of the Iran nuclear deal may dramatically ratchet up military tensions in the Middle East , [ARG0: political analysts] [V: warned] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] .
